EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_GigaOm Structure_Q214.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: GigaOM Structure – A Pivotal Thanks!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for visiting the Pivotal booth during GigaOM Structure. Structure was full of meaningful keynotes and sessions that really emphasized the progression of cloud computing. Pivotal had several presentations at Structure, including:
- Scott Yara keynoting Is Being Multi-Cloud Even Possible? <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/session/is-being-multi-cloud-even-possible/> - James Watters and Rosie Pongracz explaining How Enterprise PaaS Lets Companies Become Software and Data Driven <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/session/pivotal-sponsor-workshop-how-enterprise-paas-lets-companies-become-software-and-data-driven/> - Todd Paoletti participating on the GE Workshop: Inspiring Disruption: The Shift to Software + Hardware <http://events.gigaom.com/structure-2014/session/ge-sponsor-workshop-inspiring-disruption-the-shift-to-software-hardware/>
Learn more about Pivotal CF <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>®, the world’s leading enterprise Platform-as-a-Service powered by Cloud Foundry here <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>. Recordings and slides are now available from the 2nd annual Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/> - click to view <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/cloud-foundry-summit-2014>. Pivotal will be at the Spark Summit <http://spark-summit.org/2014>in SF next week, so come by and talk to our Big Data product experts!
Thanks!
The Pivotal Team
